title: Ray A. and Robert L. Kroc Lectureship
description: To advance arthritis and connective tissue diseases research by support of a lectureship and/or short tenures of visiting scientists at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
marketingContent: To advance arthritis and connective tissue diseases research by support of a lectureship and/or short tenures of visiting scientists at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
